divs: Sighting DetailsDuring the early morning hours of the summer of 1981, while I was deviveringpapers on my route, just before the sun began to come up, I looked up from whatI was doing and noticed a red dot on the horizon: The light was moving as if itwas traveling slowly in a contstant motion
